alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 5:30PM CST until November 29 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 529 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Zwolle, or 29 miles northwest of Anacoco, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Many around 545 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Robeline and Marthaville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
